text:
The first question is:
What does Melinda Gates look like?
Uh, this?

Yeah, you look pretty much the same on video
as you look like in person.
Yeah.
Is Bill Gates still alive?
Wow.
Yeah.
Why don’t you give more in the United States?
We do give a lot in the United States.

We give to education
through scholarships and helping to make public
schools better.
That’s a huge focus of our foundation.
Why are you really giving your money away?
We try and have an impact.

It’s fun work that we’ve dedicated
ourselves to.

We’re giving our money away because we believe
that we can make the world a better place
and we should do that while we’re here.
What’s your new annual letter about?

Well it’s about the ten toughest questions
that we’ve gotten throughout the year.

And we just thought we should take those head
on.

So we decided to base the Annual Letter on
that.
Does saving kids’ lives lead to overpopulation?

Why don’t you give money to fight climate
change?
Are you imposing your values on other cultures?
Where can I read your annual letter?

It’s going to be
at gatesletter.com
